about_the_game:
Zombies. Guns. Bodycam. ZOMBIECAM blends realism and immersion in a well paced first person shooter arena experience. Fight against hordes of zombies in round-based arena environments, achieve in-level weapon unlocks and use explosives and the environment to your advantage.

What to expect:

LEVELS: Map environments look and feel authentic with realistic lighting and effects. Some photorealistic assets are already in the game.

COMBAT: Expect zombie hordes to be bigger and more diverse throughout each round. Apex zombies will be harder to kill. Use the layout of the arena to your advantage and use the right weapon for each horde situation you are in. 

WEAPONS: Weapons feel powerful and do the job of reducing the horde. Unlock more weapons are the initial rounds go by. Axe, Revolver, AK47, Shotgun, Flamethrower, Molotov cocktails and SMG are already in the game.

HUD: ZOMBIECAM is aiming for a realistic display with no HUD other then the bodycam-style border. Temporary blood on screen when taking damage. The overall display of the game leans towards realism along with lifelike audio effects as well. 

Feel free to start a discussion!

Coming Q2 2025. Wishlist now on Steam.

Press and Inquiries: contact@zombiecamgame.com

content_descriptors.notes: Contains strong violence and blood and gore.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
